name: dry food for dogs
title: Matzinger Mini Menu · dry food for dogs · chicken and vegetables
description: Matzinger dry food for dogs chicken and vegetables

mainInformation.origin: You can find information about the origin on the packaging in the store.

petFoodBasicInformation.composition: Composition: Cereals (whole grain 55%), Meat and animal derivatives (15% of which 4% chicken), Oils and fats, Derivatives of vegetable origin, Vegetable protein extracts, minerals, Vegetables (0.6% dehydrated vegetables equivalent to 4% vegetables).
petFoodBasicInformation.additives: Additives:Nutritional additives:IU/kg: Vit A: 19000; Vit D3: 1100; Vit E: 90; mg/kg: 3b103: (Fe: 78); 3b202: (I: 1.9); 3b405: (Cu: 8.7); 3b503: (Mn: 5.9); 3b605: (Zn:110); 3b801: (Se: 0.19); Vitamin B group: 75.Colourants(1) and antioxidants(1)no artificial colourants.Additives:Nutritional additives:IU/kg: Vit A: 19000; Vit D3: 1100; Vit E: 90; mg/kg: Iron (II) sulphate monohydrate: (Fe: 78); Calcium iodate anhydrous: (I: 1.9); Copper (II) sulphate pentahydrate: (Cu: 8.7); Manganous sulphate monohydrate: (Mn: 5.9); Zinc sulphate monohydrate: (Zn:110); Sodium selenite: (Se: 0.19); Vitamin B group: 75.Colourants(1) and antioxidants(1)no artificial colourants.

usageInformation.usage: Clean, fresh water should be available at all times. this product is not a toy Keep your children and pets away from this bag to avoid any risk of suffocation.
usageInformation.additionalInformation: Matzinger Mini Menü is a balanced complete food for dogs of small breeds. The specially developed smaller croquettes are made with high quality ingredients and fibers to promote healthy digestion.

petFoodStorageInformation.instructions: Feeding guide: Dry + Wet: MIX FEEDING (DRY + WET) Daily Feeding Amounts for Small dog Dry Wet Normal Activity More Active wet pouch* Body Weight Quantity Dry Quantity Dry (kg) (g/Day) (g/Day) (100g) 1 20 25 1 5 95 110 1 10 140 165 2 *of any “Friskies pouch in Gravy” Adult 100g pouch. Availability can vary from one country to another. These amounts are averages based on moderately active dogs at normal environmental temperatures. Individual needs vary and feeding should be adjusted as required to maintain your dog at a lean, healthy body weight. Fresh clean drinking water should always be available.

otherInformation.legalDesignation: Complete pet food for small adult dogs up to 10kg
otherInformation.distributorStreetAndNumber: (CH) Nestlé Suisse S.A., Nestlé Purina PetCare, CP 352, CH-1800 Vevey

remarks.value: Keep pet food in a cool and dry place.

mainSpecificities.value: Dies sind Durchschnittswerte,  basierend auf den Bedürfnissen von kleinrassigen,  ausgewachsenen Hunden mit unterschiedlichen Aktivitätsniveaus bei normalen Umgebungstemperaturen. Die individuellen Bedürfnisse können variieren und die Futtermenge sollte entsprechend angepasst werden. Sauberes,  frisches Trinkwasser sollte stets zur Verfügung stehen.
